headline: Cloudflare DDoS threat report for 2022 Q4
keywords: DDoS, Cloudflare Radar, DDoS Reports, Insights, Trends
description: In Q4, Cloudflare mitigated millions of DDoS attacks. Attack durations increase, volumetric attacks surged, and ransom DDoS attacks persist. Travel & events industries were hit hardest and over 90% of traffic to Chinese Internet properties were L3/4 DDoS attacks. Read more on our recent report.
